content: jrwren has marked this topic as resolved.

Great interview.

I listened to this a year ago when it first was released, and I listened to it today.

I'm only a couple of years older than Adam and listening to the stories of his youth remind me of my own.

I'd love to hear a follow-up from Adam about what he has been up to lately.
For these remaster episodes have the audio versions changed or is it just to introduce the addition of the youtube video?
Tweaked but not probably noticeably since it was pretty good the first time too

My LinkedIn feed blew up this morning with folks that got affected by layoffs at SI this week. Sounds like they are continuing but with a much smaller team. I still think the product fills a need so I'm hoping they are able to turn it around, having to layoff folks you've been in the trenches with for years is never pleasant.
